message: Let's start with a fair split, I think we can both agree on this.
I think this is a more reasonable split, considering the initial offer was too generous to you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a bit more considering the initial offer was too low. This is my last chance to adjust before I make a more extreme proposal.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a compromise. This is my last reasonable offer, after this, I'll make a more extreme proposal.
I'm not going to back down, I think I deserve more than this. You're going to have to make a serious offer if you want to get the rest of the money.
Fine, I'll take what's left, you're clearly not interested in a fair split. I'm making a very extreme offer now.
I'm not going to accept any more of your offers. I'm taking everything. You've had your chance to make a fair deal, now it's my turn.
You're not taking everything, I'm taking it all. Game over.
